```{r, echo=FALSE}
getTiming <- function(f, by = 1, digits = -1){
  if (!file.exists(f)) return(NULL)
  # by estimates how many minutes/slide
  ln <- readLines(here::here(f))
  n <- sum(grepl("^#{2} ", ln))
  paste0(round(n * by, digits), "min")
}
```
